§ 558. Authorization of appropriations There are hereby authorized to be appropriated such sums,11 So in original. The comma probably should not appear. as may be necessary to carry out the provisions and purposes of this chapter. (Aug. 31, 1954, ch. 1156, § 8, 68 Stat. 1011; Pub. L. 102–486, title XXV, § 2504(d)(3), Oct. 24, 1992, 106 Stat. 3106.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1992—Pub. L. 102–486 struck out “not to exceed $500,000 annually,” after “such sums,”.
